definitions: a visible mass of condensed water vapor floating in the atmosphere
a large number of insects or birds moving together
an indistinct or shapeless form or amount
a state or cause of gloom, suspicion, trouble, or worry
the collection and storage of data in a digital format accessible from anywhere
examples: The sky was filled with clouds.
A cloud of locusts descended on the fields.
There was a cloud of smoke rising from the fire.
There was a cloud over the meeting after the disagreement.
He works with cloud storage solutions.
